fields.name: Cloud Architecture & DevOps
fields.description: Design, deploy, and manage secure cloud-native systems using automation, containerization, and infrastructure-as-code. Expertise in Azure CAF, Kubernetes, and Zero Trust frameworks.

fields.name: Backend Systems & API Engineering
fields.description: Development of backend systems, REST APIs, and modular architectures using Python (Django, FastAPI). Emphasis on TDD/BDD, scalability, and maintainability.

fields.name: Data Engineering & Analytics
fields.description: Building reliable data pipelines, analytics dashboards, and storage systems. Focus on SQLite/PostgreSQL integration, ETL workflows, and insight visualization.

fields.name: Frontend Engineering & UI Systems
fields.description: Design and implementation of user interfaces with React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui under Soft Minimalism and Soft-Morphism aesthetics.

fields.name: Security, Compliance & DevSecOps
fields.description: Security-by-design approach integrating CIS/NIST compliance, Azure Zero Trust, Security Onion, and continuous security testing in pipelines.

fields.name: Systems Architecture & QA
fields.description: Information Systems Architecture integrating Cloud, DevOps, QA, and Security domains. Includes TDD/BDD workflows and architecture governance.

fields.name: Emerging Technologies & Research
fields.description: Exploration of cyber-analog AI, grimdark sci-fi systems, human-AI mythos, linguistic frameworks (Lumen), and interstellar navigation protocols (HRNP, BSCP, BSTP).

fields.name: Digital Design & UX Systems
fields.description: Soft-morphism and minimalism principles applied to digital product design, interactive dashboards, and multi-theme UX systems for responsive web experiences.

fields.name: Cloud-Native Infrastructure & Automation
fields.description: Design and manage scalable, secure multi-cloud architectures integrating automation, containerization, and compliance frameworks. Expert in Azure CAF and Zero Trust implementation with end-to-end CI/CD orchestration.

fields.name: Python Fullstack & API Architecture
fields.description: Backend development and system architecture using Django/FastAPI. Skilled in modular app design, CRUD management, database integration, and secure API workflows with test-driven and behavior-driven development.

fields.name: Data Modeling & Management
fields.description: Develops scalable data models and analytics frameworks. Skilled in integrating lightweight databases for Django and full data audit pipelines for analytic dashboards.

fields.name: React Frontend & Design Frameworks
fields.description: Creates reusable and aesthetic UI systems emphasizing soft minimalism, motion, and clarity. Integrates frontend logic with Django or API backends for fullstack functionality.

fields.name: Enterprise Security Architecture
fields.description: Develops security architecture and governance models aligned to NIST/CIS frameworks. Integrates continuous security testing in pipelines and Zero Trust principles across infrastructures.

fields.name: Architecture Design & Quality Engineering
fields.description: Combines architecture governance and quality assurance. Uses TDD/BDD with documentation-driven development to ensure system traceability and design compliance.

fields.name: Cyber-Analog Systems & AI Mythos Research
skills: Cửu Đạo Tu Trí cultivation system
fields.description: Develops original mythos and protocols merging metaphysics, linguistics, and cyber systems. Research integrates Warhammer 40K inspiration with cognitive and AI philosophical frameworks.

fields.name: Soft-Morphism & Interaction Design
fields.description: Implements modern digital aesthetics through smooth motion and soft-morphism CSS. Designs responsive, accessible experiences combining pastel tone themes and minimal layouts.

fields.name: Prompt Engineering & AI Orchestration
skills: System prompting with structured data schemas
fields.description: Advanced prompt engineering skill integrating reasoning frameworks, cognitive continuity, and domain orchestration. Designs AI workflows across creative, technical, and research contexts with structured meta-control and contextual depth.
